page.title: 09HOME LIFE BEDWORTH
page.content: The average child living in our area will get up between 7-8am.About half will watch"Breakfast televison".Most eat a cereal breakfast & in Bedworth Heath,50% make their own.Father will probably have a full time job & 50% of mothers too.Many children get up after father has gone to work & wish they could see more of him.Most children walk to school,living quite close. They are most likely to go straight home,but in Bedworth Heath 20% go to a friends,a child minder or relative.80% eat a cooked dinner between 5-7pm.They are likely to spend their evening playing out or watching television & video.50% have a hobby which takes up some of their time,the most popular being participation in sports or the Scout/Guide movement.8-12yr.olds go to bed between 9-10pm but in Bedworth Heath 31% go after 10pm.
